title: Evaluation of magnetic hyperthermia, drug delivery and biocompatibility (bone cell adhesion and zebrafish assays) of trace element co-doped hydroxyapatite combined with Mn–Zn ferrite for bone tissue applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29242-29253
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03867C, Paper
Open Access

Tanatsaparn Tithito, Siwapech Sillapaprayoon, Varissara Chantho, Wittaya Pimtong, Jirawan Thongbunchoo, Narattaphol Charoenphandhu, Nateetip Krishnamra, Nararat Yong, Aurachat Lert-itthiporn, Weerakanya Maneeprakorn, Weeraphat Pon-On
The treatment and regeneration of bone defects, especially tumor-induced defects, is an issue in clinical practice and remains a major challenge for bone substitute material invention.
